Essentials

De cercar la liebre (Catch the hare) is a hunt game: one player is the prey, his opponent has 12 hunters.

Start position:

To win

Hunters must surround the hare with no possibilty for it to escape by capture.

The hare wins if it eliminates enough hunters so that they can not surround it.

Your turn

Move one piece to an adjacent free position.

If you are the hare, you can eliminate a hunter by jumping over him. You can eliminate several hunters with consecutive jumps. Capture is not compulsory.
